page.title: 15Health-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: {2 doctors}come to our village.They have a small house for a surgery.1 comes each week on a Thursday,the other comes once every fortnight on a Tuesday morning.A{ mobile baby {clinic}comes once every month on a Monday morning,here babies are weighed and parents discuss problems.There is also a mobile{chiropodist}which comes once a month. There are no dental services,but the dentist,the optician,and the audiologist all come to school. If anyone needs medical treatment urgently they go to {Clitheroe Health Centre. The nearest{casualty hospital}is 15 miles away in Skipton and for specialist treatment patients may have to travel 20 miles to Blackburn or Burnley hospitals.
